title: TeamSpeak
description: TeamSpeak is known for its vibrant color palette that includes a dominant bright blue (hex code: 2580C3) matched with darker undertones of grayish blue (hex code: 1C2537). A neutral light gray (hex code: E0E0E0) complements the vibrancy, while a fresh green (hex code: 25DD85) adds a pop to this balanced color scheme. These colors are showcased prominently on their official website, emphasizing a modern and tech-savvy image.
